name: BridgeLabz Solutions
description: BridgeLabz, an AWS recognized incubator, focuses on enhancing tech employability. Partnering with 700+ leading tech firms like Yatra and Capgemini, it has placed over 6000 engineers. Recognized with the Business World Techtor Award 2020 and securing 2nd place at the Global Edtech Startup Awards 2019, it's also a top 100 startup as per the Maharashtra government. BridgeLabz collaborates with NSDC and Yunus Social Fund for skill development and innovation.
Headline: Nurturing Engineers through our Experiential Fellowship Program
ShortDescription: BridgeLabz helps in Bridging the Gap Between Talent and Opportunity.

Highlights.name: Fast-Track to Job-Ready
Highlights.description: Master in-demand skills in just 16 weeks with 500+ coding hours.

Highlights.name: Expert Mentorship
Highlights.description: Learn from the best with a 1:10 mentor ratio.

enhanced_description: BridgeLabz, an AWS recognized incubator, offers an Experiential Fellowship Program designed to enhance tech employability and bridge the gap between talent and opportunity. The program is a fast-track to job-readiness, enabling individuals to master in-demand skills in just 16 weeks, involving over 500 coding hours. It features expert mentorship with a 1:10 mentor ratio and is delivered through 100% live and interactive sessions for active learning. BridgeLabz emphasizes real projects for real results, aiming to help participants land their dream job. They have successfully placed over 6000 engineers by partnering with 700+ leading tech firms including Yatra and Capgemini. The organization has received significant recognition, including the Business World Techtor Award 2020 and securing 2nd place at the Global Edtech Startup Awards 2019, and is listed as a top 100 startup by the Maharashtra government. BridgeLabz also collaborates with NSDC and Yunus Social Fund for skill development and innovation.
key_use_cases: Tech talent development for job readiness
Building a pipeline of job-ready tech talent for companies
competitive_advantages: Extensive network of 700+ leading tech firm partners for placements
Proven track record with over 6000 engineers placed
Award-winning recognition (Business World Techtor Award 2020, Global Edtech Startup Awards 2019)
Government recognition (Top 100 startup as per Maharashtra government)
Partnerships with NSDC and Yunus Social Fund for skill development
Structured 16-week, 500+ coding hour experiential fellowship program
High-quality expert mentorship with a 1:10 mentor ratio
Focus on real projects for practical experience
roi_benefits: For individuals (engineers): Accelerated career readiness (16 weeks), acquisition of in-demand tech skills, improved job placement prospects, access to expert mentorship and real-world project experience.

For partner companies: Access to a pool of pre-trained, job-ready engineers; reduced time-to-hire for tech roles; enhanced tech talent pipeline; partnership with an award-winning and recognized talent incubator.
primary_users: HR Departments of Tech Firms (as beneficiaries of talent pool)
